title: Metaverse is ‘going to be a very big opportunity,' Qualcomm CEO says - Yahoo Finance
content: Metaverse is ‘going to be a very big opportunity,' Qualcomm CEO says  Yahoo Finance
description: In Q1 2022, Meta’s metaverse business operated at a loss of nearly $3 billion, causing skepticism in the market about whether metaverse truly has a place in the digital future. In spite of the skepticism, Qualcomm CEO Cristiano Amon agrees that the best has yet to come for metaverse adoption and investment.
